Furra
Sight for MBT

I really liked the original style so I changed a lot things to make it nice for all vehicles. The file contains 3 version. Normal, High Zoom(13+), Range(distance slider)

This is a fork of highly edited sight from <3 Front_Wind.
Link to the original sight: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1087965/en/

+added borderless version
#universal #all_tanks #mbt

Vora
Sight for MBT

It`s a mix of a Israel and German sights with added barrel elevation on sides
Can be applied to all tanks.

#Anime #kobayashisan_chi_no_maid_dragon #Ilulu #sights #all_tanks #wtdraw

UPDATED!!! SHOULD RENDER BLACK SHORE FLOWER CORRECTLY NOW!! TY FOR HELP!

Tutorial:

1. Extract folder
2. Copy and Paste 'all_tanks' folder to your folder 'UserSights' in WarThunder files directory, if you don't have this folder yet, create your own one with the same name exactly otherwise it won't work
3. if you have all_tanks folder then just copy and paste the sight file into it
4. Restart WarThunder if it's on
5. Enjoy, we hope.

NOTE:
This is my first sight, and i have noticed some render issues in game first person, if you know how to fix it please contact...
